subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kyle Wilson scored his first N.H.L. goal and Mathieu Garon stopped 28 shots to lead the Columbus Blue Jackets past the visiting Philadelphia Flyers, 2-1.
snippet: Kyle Wilson scored his first N.H.L. goal and Mathieu Garon stopped 28 shots to lead the Columbus Blue Jackets past the visiting Philadelphia Flyers, 2-1.
